👋 Hello! Welcome to our store.
You can type *catalog* to see all products, or send a product image/SKU for details.
📦 Please send the product image or type the SKU (e.g., SKU_1), and I’ll instantly give you its price and details.

🛒 To place an order:
1️⃣ Send the product image or SKU
2️⃣ We’ll reply with product details
3️⃣ You confirm, and we’ll send you the payment and delivery options
🚚 Delivery typically takes *40 days*. We share status once dispatched.
📍 Yes, we deliver across India including Mumbai, Delhi, Surat, Ahmedabad, Pune, and more.
📋 Type *catalog* to view our full product list with pricing and dimensions.

🛠️ We also provide *Amazon Seller Account Management Services*:

• 📦 Product Listing & SEO
• 🎯 PPC Campaign Setup & Management
• 🧾 A+ Content Creation
• 🛒 FBA / FBM Setup
• 📊 Sales & Performance Analytics
• 🛡️ Account Health Support

Reply with *call* or *talk to expert* to know more or get a callback.

📞 You can speak with our expert at *+91-9558584466*
📲 [Click to Call](tel:+919558584466)
Or reply with your *name and phone*, and we’ll call you back.
